name: Valve Map File
summary: A VMF file is a game level created by Valve Hammer Editor (version 4 or later), a level editor for GoldSrc and Source engine games, such as Half-Life, Counter-Strike, and Team Fortress 2. It stores plain-text XML-like details about a level, including object placement, textures, lighting, and entity configurations. Game modders edit VMF files before converting them as .BSP game maps to be playable in a game.
